file_content.text: General Var Suthra's camp is in the Labor Valley sector. Good luck, Master Jedi.
I broke the bottleneck trapping our forces here. We have access to the Labor Valley region.
The all-clear just came in moments ago. We're already establishing beachheads all over that sector.
If we don't break the Empire's hold on this sector, our offensive will be over before it's begun.
All Jedi reinforcements are present and accounted for.
Reports say you broke the Imperial blockade. We're establishing beachheads all over the Labor Valley sector.
General Var Suthra is requesting you on a priority channel. Patching him through now....
Hello, my old friend. I understand you're supreme commander of the Jedi forces here.
I see you're back in the thick of things. What can I do for you, sir?
Good to see you, General.
There's a Jedi Master helping the Empire destroy Corellia. I need to find him.
My mission is critical.
Master Satele has asked me to assist your mission however I can.
Why, were you hoping to be in charge?
Is that a problem for you?
Commanding regular troops is hard enough. Wouldn't dream of ordering Jedi around.
Master Satele has informed me you're looking for a Jedi Master helping the enemy.
I'm placing my resources at your disposal. I have a base camp in Labor Valley. Bring your people to my position.
You go on ahead. I will guide our forces there.
I'll make sure everyone gets on the next transport. You don't need to wait for us.
I'll see you soon, my friend. Var Suthra out....
We still haven't broken the Imperial blockade in this sector. The situation's getting worse every moment.
General Aves is leading forces to break the Empire's stranglehold. He needs your help.
These young Jedi are unprepared for what lies ahead. Those of us with battlefield experience will share our knowledge while you're gone.
These reinforcements have no battlefield experience. We'll prepare them to face the enemy while you clear the path.
I'll be back as soon as I've broken that blockade.
Good plan.
Seems to me an army of Jedi could break this blockade easily.
Can't we do this together?
We must manage our forces carefully. This situation requires more than brute force.
She's right. The general requested a crack squad for this mission, not a full company.
From what I've heard about this blockade, we're more likely to get everyone killed.
He's right. The general is looking for a crack squad to handle this, not a battalion.
Some reinforcements. I'd be better off with a shipload of battle droids.
I may as well be alone.
We must make do with what we have.
These Jedi will be better than droids when we're done training them. I promise you that.
Find Corporal Hartke. He'll introduce you to the general. And good luck....
The last transport of reinforcements is docking now. There's still Jedi on the planet not accounted for, though. Hope you find them.
Transports from Kinyen and Duro brought more reinforcements. We're still waiting for others. Keep up the search for your people already here.
Reinforcements from Orto and Rodia have arrived. You should keep searching for your people out there.
Your reinforcements will arrive soon. The rest of your people are somewhere in this sector. When you find them, send them here.
I want those shield generators online yesterday! Move it, privates!
Captain Rikdine? Master Satele Shan sent me. I'm the new Jedi commander.
You made it--thank the skies. The Empire controls so much of Corellia, we can barely establish a landing zone.
The enemy has us under constant bombardment. We're in a blasted bottleneck.
I'll deal with that once I've rallied the Jedi on the ground. Master Satele said you could help.
I need the other Jedi.
I've sent more of your people home in body bags than I want to count. There aren't many of you left.
Sounds like our first order of business is knocking a hole in the Empire's forward lines.
How can we break out?
You'll want to speak with Corporal Hartke about that. My job is to organize your forces.
There has to be a better spot than this. Hasn't anyone looked?
Find another landing zone.
We lost ten thousand men securing that spaceport. We pull out, we'll lose ten thousand more.
The shuttles bringing your reinforcements will arrive shortly. In the meantime, you should gather the few already here.
I have coordinates to the last known locations of your fellow Jedi. That's the best I can offer.
You've done well. I'll take it from here.
It will be enough.
I'm not here to pick up corpses. I need to know if these people are alive.
Are the Jedi alive or dead?
Even if I could make that assurance now, things change moment to moment out there. That's how bad it is.
I should know better than to expect anything useful from you people.
Typical.
Between the bombardment and enemy patrols, it's chaos out there. We're doing the best we can.
This location is the rallying point for your forces. As the reinforcements arrive, they'll come here.
Take the intel on the Jedi you're looking for. I hope you find them.
We can't engage the enemy until we break out of this sector.
